page.title: 01 Education
page.content: The only educational establishment in this area is{Inchmore Primary School}. The school teaches around 50_60 pupils aged from 4_12 years.Once they leave this school the pupils go to { {Charelston Academy}about 7 miles away in Inverness. The school has 3 teachers,and pupils come from a radius of approximetley 2 miles .There are three itinerant teachers,a music teacher ,a sewing teacher and an art teacher. Every Friday the top 2 classes go to Inverness for swimming lessons.We are driven into Inverness by some of the pupils parents. The school has a football team.We have just played against Tomnacross and lost 4_3. The boys also play foxy,tig,corners ,garages and marbles.The girls play buzz,sardines,dodge ball & skipping.
